title: Fixes #14563 FAQ translations on the web page

body: Fixes #14563 ### Changes In the Vuex store action getFAQ, retrieve the language code from the i18n store state, and include it in the query of the FAQ API GET request. This modification ensures that the FAQ API request aligns with the user's selected language for internationalization. (Tested this with Ukrainian) [//]: # (Put User ID in here - found on the Habitica website at User Icon > Settings > API) ---- UUID: 67968b90-5b20-45a6-9589-e8055a16cf2a
As a first-time contributor, the test workflow hasn't run automatically. Could an admin please click the button to start it? 🙏🏼

Thanks for this, @umbrella-h, and welcome to the ranks of the Blacksmiths at tier 1!

We'll get this live on the production site within a few days.
